casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Smith, Appellant, v. Board of Education of the Marion City School District, Appellee.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Smith, v. Marion City Bd. of Edn. (1985), 16 Ohio St. 3d 28.]

(No. 84-323 Decided February 27, 1985.) Martin, Eichenberger & Baxter Co., L.P.A., and Mr. Stephen D. Martin, for appellant. Dennis M. Whalen Co., L.P.A., Mr. Dennis M. Whalen and Mr. R. Brent Minney, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals (case No. 9-83-34) dismissing the complaint for a writ of mandamus as being moot is affirmed.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, C. Brown, Douglas and Wright, JJ., concur.
